name: PINHOLE MONSTER WARS
description:
*Pinball Monster Wars takes away from the conventional pinball experience and puts it into a completely different gameplay environment that can only be found in the Time Marker Mobile Pinhole free games collection. Pinball Monster Wars is set in a cool sci-fi fantasy type environment and in addition Monster wars will keep your adrenaline going for hours. Unlike conventional pinball machines, Pinball Monster Wars offers multi-flippers, triggers, and a cinematic-like experience.

Tap the screen as much as possible before the angry monster pushes the ball out of the play area.

*In addition, Pinball Monster Wars gives you a variety of triggers and flippers in order to hit the ball. It features 11 triggers and 8 flippers uniquely designed for a nonstop action game experience.

*You must do your best to keep the ball moving before the monster kicks it out of the pinball area. The monster moves unpredictably and is capable of destroying the ball by pushing it out of bounds at any time.

*Pinhole, Pinball also features a multi triggers system to keep the ball moving consistently without stopping. Pinball Monster Wars delivers exhilarating energy by consistently moving the ball on the screen nonstop.

The ball is also adjusted to move quickly to add to the excitement you been waiting for. Try our uniquely designed Time Marker Mobile Pinhole/Pinball free series. We offer a variety of uniquely designed Pinball games. Try our Pinhole/Pinball free arcade series today.

OBJECTIVE
•score as much as possible before the angry monster pushes the fast-moving ball out of the area.
